# [\#65 Issue](https://github.com/typst/biblatex/issues/65) `open`: No `Entry::set_editor()` function

#### <img src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/92429150?u=84c8e93c3d9d0590aa992b5c0e49b40f7a0b56ca&v=4" width="50">[FettGoenner](https://github.com/FettGoenner) opened issue at [2024-11-06 11:18](https://github.com/typst/biblatex/issues/65):

`Entry::set_editor()` is missing.
Are there reasons for this?

My use case is a converter from `hayagriva::Library` to `biblatex::Bibliography` that I'm trying to hack into existence.
This functionality definitely would help.
